Logistics Core (1.0)

Packages 
Package Description
org.mars3142.logistics
Logistics Core (usable for Android, Desktop and iOS)
org.mars3142.logistics.ashley.component
Ashley Component
org.mars3142.logistics.ashley.factory
Factories for generating objects
org.mars3142.logistics.ashley.renderer
Renderers for the Ashley Entity System
org.mars3142.logistics.ashley.screen
Screens not related to some specific location
org.mars3142.logistics.ashley.screen.home
Screens in the house
org.mars3142.logistics.ashley.screen.interruption
Every interruption in the main game (Crash, Hijack, Police control...)
org.mars3142.logistics.ashley.screen.office
Screens in the office
org.mars3142.logistics.ashley.screen.town
Screens in the town
org.mars3142.logistics.ashley.signal
Listeners for some objects (Entity or Player.PlayerListener)
org.mars3142.logistics.ashley.system
EntitySystem for processing specific tasks
org.mars3142.logistics.factory
Factories for loading json files (e.g. contacts)
org.mars3142.logistics.factory.prototypes
Data classes for the json files
org.mars3142.logistics.inputprocessor
Input processors for interacting with the user
org.mars3142.logistics.manager
Manager classes
org.mars3142.logistics.manager.asset
Reads asset data from json file and add it to the global AssetManager
org.mars3142.logistics.manager.finitestatemanager
Finite State Managers (mostly for Artificial Intelligence)
org.mars3142.logistics.platform
Resolvers, because every platform needs some specific coding (Achievements, In-App-Purchase)
org.mars3142.logistics.screen
Screens
org.mars3142.logistics.spriter
Using animations and graphics created by Spriter
org.mars3142.logistics.tween
Using of the TweenEngine
org.mars3142.logistics.util
Static helper classes
